## host.Api.close() method

Closes the host in the native app. When being called in the native app, this action closes the modal browser window. Nothing happens if called within a browser tab.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close(request?: CloseRequest): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [CloseRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.host.closerequest.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
sdk.host.close();
```
